title: Macy’s Posts Quarterly Gains, Helped by Digital Sales
sub_head: The department-store giant said it would remain an omnichannel retailer
body:
Macy’s Inc. posted higher sales in its latest quarter and said that it wouldn’t go through with a separation of its e-commerce business from its bricks-and-mortar operation.
The retailer has been under pressure from an activist investor to split off its e-commerce operations from its physical stores.
